content.p: Please view alternative course options below. We are not offering American and Canadian Studies undergraduate courses for 2025 entry. Alternative courses for 2025 which include elements of American and Canadian Studies are: As a student of any of these courses, you may participate in the University of Nottingham Study Abroad scheme. Or you can check out our online prospectus to find another course that sparks your interest.
